Hi,
NerdDinner works out of the box if you run the code in the development environment with the MSVS build in Development Server thingy to replace IIS but that is no good for debugging code that the goes into a real IIS environment.
Please just change the VS project/web tabs option to "use Local IIS web server" prior to testing on a XP box that has IIS5.1 (not sure it is version dependant thing) and see what happens.

As many have said on the net the problem seems to be with paths (files not found) the default page loads ok but none of the others do.:(

Thanks.

Development environment...
MS Virtual PC 2007.
OS XP
IIS 5.1
VS2008 SP1 3.5
